value.halfverse: because he has inclined his ear to me whenever I called upon him.
value.verse: I love the LORD, because he has heard the voice of my supplication, *

value.halfverse: I came to grief and sorrow.
value.verse:
The cords of death entangled me;
the grip of the grave took hold of me; *

value.halfverse: “O LORD, I pray you, save my life.”
value.verse: Then I called upon the Name of the LORD: *
Gracious is the LORD and righteous; *
value.halfverse: our God is full of compassion.

value.verse: The LORD watches over the innocent; *
value.halfverse: I was brought very low, and he helped me.

value.verse: Turn again to your rest, O my soul. *
value.halfverse: for the LORD has treated you well.
my eyes from tears, and my feet from stumbling.
value.verse: For you have rescued my life from death, *

value.halfverse: in the land of the living.
value.verse: I will walk in the presence of the LORD *

value.halfverse: In my distress I said, “No one can be trusted.”
value.verse:
I believed, even when I said,
“I have been brought very low.” *
How shall I repay the LORD *
value.halfverse: for all the good things he has done for me?
and call upon the Name of the LORD.
value.verse: I will lift up the cup of salvation *

value.halfverse: in the presence of all his people.
value.verse: I will fulfill my vows to the LORD *
Precious in the sight of the LORD *
value.halfverse: is the death of his servants.

I am your servant and the child of your handmaid;
 you have freed me from my bonds.
value.verse: O LORD, I am your servant; *

value.halfverse: and call upon the Name of the LORD.
value.verse: I will offer you the sacrifice of thanksgiving *

value.halfverse: in the presence of all his people,
value.verse: I will fulfill my vows to the LORD *

value.halfverse:
in the midst of you, O Jerusalem.
 Hallelujah!
value.verse: In the courts of the LORD’S house, *
